DOC.criteria: Any gender age 18 year . Refractive lens exchange ( RLE ) cataract surgery . Healthy cornea , treat surgically . Patients willing surgery eye short period time ( within 2 week ) . Patients request receive IOL MINI WELL READY implant Previous corneal surgery ( i.e . pterygium , refractive surgery ) . Eye diseases determine probable postoperative visual acuity < 20/40 .
